caption: The mysteries reveal a journey from youthful wisdom to divine revelation.
image_prompt: A triptych-style illustration depicting three scenes: 1) A young boy with a radiant face engaged in earnest discussion with wise teachers in an ancient temple, surrounded by scrolls and sunlight filtering through stone arches. 2) A man standing in a flowing river, light breaking through clouds above as a dove descends, with onlookers witnessing the divine moment. 3) A wedding feast where water transforms into rich red wine in stone jars, with guests marveling at the miracle, all rendered in the detailed, luminous style of Renaissance fresco art with accurate anatomy and perspective.
